String.string: Reward: receive two Valkyon's Response when using instance matching.
Decrease cooldown of instance in half & increase instance entries by 100%

Earnest Money: exemption
Trading brokerage fee: 5%
Brokerage Registration Number: 50
Broker's price negotiation: Availabe
Reward: receive Valkyon's Response when using instance matching system between srevers.
Decrease cooldown of instance in half & increase instance entries by 100%
Apply Instance Beginner System

Reward: receive Valkyon's Response when using instance matching system between servers.
Apply Instance Beginner System

Monthly Account Rewards:
Two Valkyon's Responses from Instance Matching.
Twice as many available daily quests.
Instance access twice as often.
Up to 50 items active on brokerage.
Exempt from earnest money requirements on brokerage.
Brokerage fee of only 10%.
Sampler mount (changes periodically).
Boosts that replenish daily.

Monthly Single Character Rewards: (via Item Claim)
Fiery halo.
Traveler's Insurance scrolls.
Free elite gift (changes monthly).

Permanent Account Rewards:
8 free character slots per server.
4 bank tabs per server.
Terminus, the argon hybrid warhorse.
"Founder" title.
Up to 30 items active on brokerage.

Monthly Account Rewards:
Two Valkyon's Responses from Instance Matching.
Twice as many available daily quests.

Village atlas.

Permanent Account Rewards:
8 characters available per server.
4 bank tabs per server.
"Veteran of the Valkyon Federation" title.
Up to 30 items active on brokerage.

Account bonuses: Double the Federation reward for completing dungeons. Double the number of daily quests available. Double access to dungeons. (Increase the number of attempts). Ability to bid up to 50 items at the auction with the broker. Broker's deposit is 5%. Broker's commission is 5%. Additional experience: +100% (VIP). Additional reputation and Valor: +100% (VIP). Additional Gold(Quests): 100% (VIP). Additional Gold(Hunting): 100% (VIP). Unassailable Crystal Keeper (VIP).

Account bonuses: Double the Federation reward for completing dungeons. Double the number of daily quests available. Double access to dungeons. (Increase the number of attempts). Ability to bid up to 50 items at the auction with the broker. Broker's deposit is 5%. Broker's commission is 5%. Fast White Stallion for moving around the world! Lucky tickets (VIP) x50(Daily). Key to the box x5(Daily). Additional experience: +100% (VIP). Additional reputation and Valor: +100% (VIP). Additional Gold(Quests): 100% (VIP). Additional Gold(Hunting): 100% (VIP). Unassailable Crystal Keeper (VIP). Traveller's Journal and Atlas. Daily VIP Gift x2(Daily).
